scripts.debug: node -e "console.log('Environment check:'); console.log('OPENAI_API_KEY:', process.env.OPENAI_API_KEY ? '[SET]' : '[NOT SET]'); console.log('MCP_AUTHORIZATION_TOKEN:', process.env.MCP_AUTHORIZATION_TOKEN ? '[SET]' : '[NOT SET]'); console.log('All env vars:', Object.keys(process.env).filter(k => k.includes('OPENAI') || k.includes('MCP')).join(', '));"
